mapper.select: select f.fac_name, f.fac_code, f.fac_status, d.down_code, d.down_reason, d.stop_date, d.down_manager,d.remark from facility f right outer join downtime d on f.fac_code = d.fac_code where f.fac_status = 'N' order by fac_code
mapper.insert: insert into downtime(down_code, stop_date, down_reason, down_manager, remark, fac_code) values (downtime_seq.nextval, to_date(sysdate,'yyyy/MM/dd') , #{downReason} , #{downManager} , #{remark} , #{facCode})
mapper.update: update facility set fac_status = case when fac_status = 'Y' then 'N' else fac_status end where fac_code = #{facCode}
